media.title: Cambridge University's Contribution to COP30
media.description: The University of Cambridge published a video about the University's contribution to COP30, featuring research at the intersection of AI and conservation.

media.title: AI in Conservation and Ecology
media.description: Discussion of AI in conservation and ecology on Nature in a Nutshell, the CIEEM (Chartered Institute of Ecology and Environmental Management) podcast, covering the integration of AI into ecological practice.

media.title: AI for Nature: Embrace with Caution
media.description: Feature review by the University of Cambridge on research at the intersection of AI and conservation science, discussing the potential benefits and the inevitable risks with Professor Chris Sandbrook.

media.title: AI, an Altruist's Guide
media.description: Panel at Wildscreen chaired by Liz Bonnin, discussing where AI fits in with storytelling and the effects it may have on scientific media.
